intro: Melodinus grandiflorus, commonly known as the large-flowered melodinus, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It is characterized by its showy, trumpet-shaped flowers that are typically pink or red in color. The plant belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is known for its milky sap, which can be toxic.
